name: Rocket League®
detailed_description:
Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and basketball-inspired Extra Modes, and more than 500 trillion possible cosmetic customization combinations.

Winner or nominee of more than 150 “Game of the Year” awards, Rocket League is one of the most critically-acclaimed sports games of all time. Boasting a community of more than 57 million players, Rocket League features ongoing free and paid updates, including new DLCs, content packs, features, modes and arenas.

What's New:
  • Rocket Pass - Purchase Rocket Pass Premium to get an initial 50% XP bonus and earn up to 70 unique rewards, including a new Battle-Car, Goal Explosion, Keys, and more!
  • Challenge System - Play Online Matches and complete Weekly Challenges to tier up and unlock unique rewards only found in Rocket Pass.
  • Esports Shop - Show off your team pride for your favorite teams in Rocket League Esports! The Rocket League Esports Shop pilot program brings new Decals, Wheels, and Player Banners that represent some of the best teams in the sport. of the best teams in the sport.

    SteamOS and Mac Beta Versions
    As we continue to upgrade Rocket League® with new technologies like DirectX 11 and a 64-bit client, it is no longer viable for us to maintain support for the macOS and Linux (SteamOS) platforms. As a result, the final patch for the macOS and Linux versions of Rocket League was released on March 10, 2020. This update disabled online functionality (such as Casual and Competitive Playlists) for players on macOS and Linux, but offline features including Local Matches, and splitscreen play are still accessible.

    Please note that Rocket League® on SteamOS and macOS may have bugs and stability issues not seen in the Windows version of the game, and these issues may not be fixed in future updates.

    NOTE: Because of agreements with our online service provider, there are certain regions that are unable to connect to Rocket League®’s online multiplayer component. As a result, server access is restricted in China, Crimea, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, and Syria. Apologies to our customers in those regions.

    Software and online features are subject to license, terms of use, and privacy policy ( rocketleague.com/eula , rocketleague.com/tou , and rocketleague.com/privacy ).

Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

achievements.description: Collect 5 Items

achievements.description: Drive on the dome walls for a total of 5 minutes

achievements.description: Play with both classic Battle-Cars (Octane and Backfire)

achievements.description: Watch a save file in Replay mode

achievements.name: Winner
achievements.description: Win a total of 5 games across any mode

achievements.name: CleanSheet
achievements.description: Win a game without giving up a single Goal

achievements.name: TripleThreat
achievements.description: Win a 3v3 game

achievements.description: Win a 2v2 game

achievements.name: SinglesClub

achievements.name: BarrasBravas
achievements.description: Play an Online game with a Friend

achievements.description: Play an Exhibition match

achievements.description: Win a Season Championship using Dominus or Takumi in every game

achievements.name: AnInchAnd62Miles
achievements.description: Drive 10 km with either the Cristiano or Spinner Wheels

achievements.name: RideOrDie
achievements.description: Equip both Dominus and Takumi with a Supersonic Fury DLC Decal and Paint Finish, then win a game

achievements.name: DontLookBack
achievements.description: Use the Burnout or Nitrous Rocket Boost for a total of 10 minutes

achievements.name: FamilyNotFriends
achievements.description: Play a complete game with both Dominus and Takumi

achievements.name: DriftKing
achievements.description: Perform a 180 powerslide with both the Cristiano and Spinner Wheels

achievements.name: SkyHigh
achievements.description: Score an Aerial Goal

achievements.name: AllFours
achievements.description: Win a 4v4 game

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Play a game on Utopia Coliseum

achievements.name: SurvivalOfTheFittest
achievements.description: Equip the Shark Fin Topper and win an Unfair Bot Match

achievements.name: Heartbreaker
achievements.description: Win a game against All-Star Bots with the Hearts Decal equipped

achievements.name: NaturalProgression
achievements.description: Win an Online Match with Scarab or Zippy

achievements.name: Throwback
achievements.description: Use the Accelerato Boost with an original Battle-Car while playing in a SARPBC-inspired arena

achievements.name: HotShotPartTwo
achievements.description: Win the MVP award using Scarab or Zippy

achievements.name: MyWorldIsFire
achievements.description: Equip any Chaos Run item and win a 4v4 Online match

achievements.name: Spectacular

achievements.name: Savage
achievements.description: With Ripper, Score 10 Goals against Pro-level Bots or higher

achievements.name: Ruthless
achievements.description: Make 50 total "Shots on Goal" using Grog or Ripper

achievements.name: PsychoMasterExploder
achievements.description: Equip the Mohawk and Demolish 3 opposing Bots in the Wasteland

achievements.name: MadScientist

achievements.name: IcingTheCake
achievements.description: In Snow Day, score a goal from your own side of the ice

achievements.name: LeftWingRightWing
achievements.description: Win a Snow Day match with both the Blue and Orange teams

achievements.name: FastBreak
achievements.description: Score at least 2 Dunks in the first minute of a Hoops game

achievements.name: BuzzerBeater
achievements.description: With 30 seconds left, win a game of Hoops in which you were tied or trailing

achievements.name: BuddingArtist
achievements.description: Collect a Painted Item

achievements.name: OneBetter
achievements.description: Increase the level of a Certified Item

achievements.name: Certifiable
achievements.description: Earn Veteran status for your Certified Item

achievements.name: GG
achievements.description: Win the MVP award in a game that goes to overtime

achievements.name: Trifecta
achievements.description: Score a Goal, Save a shot, and Assist a teammate in a single game

achievements.description: Activate every power-up in Rocket League® Rumble

achievements.name: StoppedCold
achievements.description: Freeze an opponent's shot before it can score

achievements.description: Head to AquaDome and score a goal while flipped on your back

achievements.name: GetUpMrBubbles
achievements.description: Equip the Bubbles Rocket Trail and Score an Aerial goal, while playing in AquaDome

achievements.name: RocketGenocider
achievements.description: Make 535 Shots on Goal

achievements.name: RegisteredVoter
achievements.description: Head to 'Arena Preferences' and use all of your votes

achievements.name: Metaverse
achievements.description: Equip the Halo Topper and win a match on Starbase ARC

achievements.name: BraveTheElements
achievements.description: Complete a match on wasted land, under the sea, and in outer space

achievements.name: DamageControl
achievements.description: Win a Dropshot match via shutout

achievements.name: FullCourse
achievements.description: Score a total of 18 Goals in Dropshot

achievements.name: BuckministerX10
achievements.description: Damage a total of 320 panels in Dropshot

achievements.name: StormTrooper
achievements.description: Equip a Very Rare Item and complete a game in an Arena with turbulent weather

achievements.name: GoodTimes
achievements.description: Head to Champions Field and complete an Online game

achievements.name: SwapMeet
achievements.description: Trade and receive one or more items with another player in a single transaction

achievements.name: TradeSecret
achievements.description: Trade In five items of the same quality to receive an item of the next-highest quality

achievements.name: RankUp
achievements.description: Complete all placement matches in any Competitive Playlist

achievements.name: ComingOnStrong
achievements.description: Score or Assist a combined 30 goals or assists in Casual or Competitive Online matches

achievements.name: JointheClub
achievements.description: Create or Join a Rocket League Club

achievements.name: TogetherisBetter
achievements.description: Play and complete an Online match with one or more Clubmates

achievements.name: NewChallenger
achievements.description: Join and complete an Online Tournament match

achievements.name: PeoplePerson
achievements.description: Play and complete 10 Online matches with one or more Clubmates

achievements.name: SquadGoals
achievements.description: Score a Goal while in a Club Match (Online Matchmaking only)

achievements.name: BestoftheBunch
achievements.description: Earn the MVP award in any Online Tournament match
